resources.string:
WELCOME TO THE QUESTION AND ANSWER QUIZ 



 Please go ahead and answer all these questions to the best of your ability. 

 The aim here is to try and test your knowledge on South African Politics 



 Each question weighs 25 % so take your time giving an answer. 

 P.S Try to get 100% !! 



 Good luck :)
What is the name of the man who the book \"A Long Walk to Freedom\" is about ?
Who wrote the South African book \" I write what I like \" ?
Please Enter the name of former President Thabo Mbeki\'s father below (capital on first name and surname)
Is Bessie Head a member of the African Writer\'s Series?
Who is the leader of the Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) in South Africa ?
